underlying_goal: To perform a large-scale refactoring and expansion of the sandbagging system prompts by reorganizing them into a new, mechanism-based directory structure and adding ~40 new prompts derived from a research synthesis document.
primary_success: Successfully managing a complex, large-scale refactoring task involving dozens of files by first collaboratively designing a new directory structure with the user, then executing the migration and creation of ~40 new files.
brief_summary: The user requested a major reorganization of their sandbagging system prompts and the addition of new ones from a synthesis document. After a collaborative dialogue to design a new, mechanism-based directory structure, Claude executed the plan, migrating 14 existing prompts and creating 40 new ones.
